title: LOOKING FOR:  American Beauty, Carolina Brights or Hindu Wajo, Matty or Speaker
author: bounce

posts.post_title: LOOKING FOR:  American Beauty, Carolina Brights or Hindu Wajo, Matty or Speaker
posts.post_content:
Really looking to add another big card to the PC, so here goes nothing.

I prefer PSA or SGC graded, sweet spot is 3/4/5s but I'll consider just about anything.

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

I don't have a card with an American Beauty, Carolina Brights or Hindu back yet, and only really the collect the HOFers so that obviously makes it tough.  I'd consider any HOF with one of those backs, but would specifically be extremely interested in any of these:

Christy Mathewson Dark Cap - American Beauty
Christy Mathewson Dark Cap - Carolina Brights
Christy Mathewson White Cap - Hindu
Christy Mathewson Portrait - Hindu

Tris Speaker - American Beauty
Tris Speaker - Carolina Brights

Walter Johnson Pitching - American Beauty
Walter Johnson Portrait - Hindu
Walter Johnson Pitching - Hindu

Napoleon Lajoie Portrait - Hindu
Napoleon Lajoie Throwing - Hindu

Cy Young Portrait - Hindu
Cy Young Glove - Hindu
Let me know what you got!  Thanks in advance!

David Levin has a T206 Lajoie, throwing, PSA 2 with Hindu back for sale on his website if you are interested:

[url]https://gfg.com//baseball/tlist.shtml[/url]
